abilities.name: Leader's Conviction
abilities.description:
You gain 100% Toughness and it does not get reduced by damage for the next 12 sec. While Leader's Conviction is active, all damage you deal is increased by 15%.
SPIRIT ABILITY
When you activate your Spirit ability you gain Spirit of Heroism, granting +30% Haste for 20 sec.

abilities.name: Measured Strike
abilities.description:
Deal 113% Strength damage to target enemy.
Generates 1 Combo Point.

abilities.name: Power Strike
abilities.description:
Deal 142% Strength damage to target.
Generates 2 Combo Points.

abilities.name: Shield Slam
abilities.description:
Deals 265% Strength damage to your target and 26.5% Strength damage to other enemies near your target.
Shield Slam generates 25% Toughness.
TOUGHNESS
The higher Toughness you have, the less damage you takes.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Charge a target enemy, causing 120% Strength damage and Stunning them for 1.5 sec.

abilities.name: Taunt
abilities.description: Taunt the target, forcing it to attack you for 6 sec.

abilities.name: Bash
abilities.description:
Interrupt the target's spellcasting and prevent it from casting for 4 sec.
Must interrupt a spell, or it will have no effect.

abilities.name: Shield Throw
abilities.description:
Throw your shield at target enemy dealing 207% Strength damage. The shield will bounce to up to 4 additional nearby enemies.
Generates 1 Combo Point per target hit.

abilities.name: Shields Up
abilities.description:
Raise your shield, increasing your Toughness by 65% and increasing your chance to Block direct attacks by 25% for 8 sec. Generates Toughness based on your Strength.
TOUGHNESS
The higher Toughness you have, the less damage Helena takes.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: Slam sword and shield together creating a shockwave, dealing 471% Strength damage and slowing their movement speed by 90%. The slow is reduced by 10% every 1 second for 9 seconds.

abilities.name: Sweeping Strike
abilities.description:
Deals 133% Strength damage to your target and other nearby enemies.
Enemies hit by Sweeping Strike bleed for 135% Strength damage over 18 seconds.

abilities.name: Chain Pull
abilities.description: Throw a chained spearhead at target enemy, dealing 100% Strength damage and pulling them to you.

abilities.name: Iron Wall
abilities.description: Your Toughness can not be reduced for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Battle Command
abilities.description:
Your Movement Speed is increased by 50% for 6 seconds.
Nearby allies gain 25% Movement Speed.

name: Helena
description:
Despite being weighed down by full plate armor, Helena is always ready to charge into the fray and protect her companions from harm.

Helena utilizes a mechanic called ‘Toughness’ which reduces the amount of damage she takes in battle. Toughness is indicated as a shield above her action bar and is affected by her shield abilities

Helena utilizes a mechanic called 'Combo Points.' Combo Points are gained by the basic attack abilities, which in turn can be spent to use more powerful abilities. Helena's current combo points are indicated by the blue orbs above her shield representing Toughness.

talents.name: The Best Defense
talents.description:
Each time you Block an attack with your shield, you have a chance to reset the cooldown of Shield Throw and increase the damage of your next Shield Throw by 30%.
Passive: Your Threat Generation is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Shield Mastery
talents.description:
The cooldown of your Shields Up And Shield Throw abilities are reduced relative to the amount of damage you mitigate with Toughness.
Passive: Your chance to Block is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Sword & Board
talents.description:
Your Power Strike has a chance to make your next Shield Slam generate additional Toughness and have no combo points cost.
Passive: Your Power Strike and Shield Slam deal 15% increased damage.

talents.name: Aftershock
talents.description:
Enemies that take damage from your Shockwave ability deal 8% reduced damage for 9 seconds.
Passive: Your Shockwave cooldown is reduced by 10%

talents.name: Skull Cracker
talents.description:
Your Shield Throw deals 100% increased damage to the first target it hits.
Passive: Your Shield Throw's Critical Strike chance is increased by 5%.

talents.name: Front Line Defender
talents.description:
The efficiency of your Toughness mechanic is increased by 15%.
Passive: Your Movement Speed is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Second Wind
talents.description:
When your Toughness has reduced an amount of damage equal to 30% of your Maximum Health, you gain 20% increased Strength for 12 sec.
Passive: You take 10% less Magic damage.

talents.name: Greater Shockwave
talents.description:
Enemies that take damage from your Shockwave are stunned for 2 seconds.
Passive: Your Shockwave deals 65% increased damage.

talents.name: Gleaming Shield
talents.description:
While Shields up is active your Shield Slam deals 40% increased damage and all healing effects on you are increased by 20%.
Passive: Your Armor is increased by 15%.

title: Warmaster
lore: The commander and sole survivor of her troop, Helena swore long ago that as long as she still breathes, no soldier under her command will ever fall in battle. Helena is a stern presence within the Fellowship, maintaining a seasoned warrior’s discipline. She uses both the shield she wields to protect others, and to distance herself becoming too familiar with her companions, lest she suffer the burden of loss again.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Jubilee
abilities.description:
You send out Dream Flutterflies to protect all allies by evenly distributing all health between them every 3 seconds over 6 sec.
SPIRIT ABILITY
When you activate your Spirit ability you gain Spirit of Heroism, granting +30% Haste and 400% Mana Regeneration for 20 sec.

abilities.name: Prickly Vine
abilities.description: Summon a Prickly Vine to continously fling thorns at target enemy, dealing 93% Intellect damage per attack. Lasts 27 seconds.

abilities.name: Nettlebolt
abilities.description: Cast a bolt of nettles at target enemy, dealing 90% Intellect damage to them.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Heal
abilities.description:
Assign one of your Pink Flutterflies to an ally, healing them for 46% Intellect every 3 seconds until it is called away.
All healing done by Fluttercall: Heal counts as Flutterfly Healing.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Restore Life
abilities.description:
Beckon two Pink Flutterflies to dance around target ally, healing them for 186% Intellect after 2 seconds and an additional 490% Intellect over 14 seconds.
All healing done by Fluttercall: Restore Life counts as Flutterfly Healing.

abilities.name: Cure Ailment
abilities.description: Remove all Harmful Magic Effects from target ally.

abilities.name: Life Petal
abilities.description:
A Life Petal sprouts up near you, healing one ally for 142% Intellect every 1 second over 10 seconds, preferring the ally with the lowest health.
Nettle to the Petal
The cooldown of Life Petal is reduced by 3 seconds each time you cast Nettlebolt.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Protect
abilities.description:
Send your Blue Flutterfly to protect target ally.
While your Blue Flutterfly is attached to an ally, all Flutterfly Healing done to them is increased by 300%.
Blue Flutterfly
Your expertise stat affects this ability.

abilities.name: Shroomsplosion
abilities.description:
Command all mature Boomshrooms to attack causing them to leap at target enemy and explode, each dealing 113% Intellect damage to all enemies within a radius.

Boomshrooms
Each time one of your plants expire, budding Boomshrooms start growing in that location. After 12 seconds, the Boomshroom has reached full maturity and is ready to be called into battle.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Embrace
abilities.description:
Recall your Blue Flutterfly to you.
While the Blue Flutterfly is on you, all Flutterfly Healing you do is increased by 100% and the mana cost of your abilities are reduced by 15%.
Blue Flutterfly
Your expertise stat affects this ability.

abilities.name: Heart Bloom
abilities.description:
Conjure a Heart Bloom at your side that stores 30% of all Flutterfly healing you do inside it.
Every 3 seconds, the Heart Bloom releases a pulse, healing all allies within 4000 radius for an amount equal to the healing it has stored. Lasts 9 seconds.

abilities.name: Hidden Trail
abilities.description:
Your Movement Speed is increased by 50% for 6 seconds.
Demure
Upon activating Hidden Trail your threat is reduced by 20% with all enemies.

abilities.name: Rootsap Revival
abilities.description: Command each active Prickly Vine to aid target ally, healing them for 259% intellect over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Bark Skin
abilities.description: Target ally takes 20% reduced damage for 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Thornbush Blossom
abilities.description: Place a Thornbush Blossom in target location. For the next 12 seconds, all allies standing in the radius of the Blossom take 20% reduced damage.

name: Sylvie
description:
Sylvie is a healer who uses her innate connection to nature and its many friends to empower her magic.

Sylvie utilizes her Flutterflies to conduct Flutterfly Healing. Sylvie is joined by 4 Pink and 1 Blue Flutterflies. She can assign these Flutterflies to her fellows with her abilities to heal them and/or increase healing received.

talents.name: Nettle to the Petal
talents.description:
The cooldown of your Life Petal is reduced by 2 seconds each time you deal damage with Nettlebolt and 4 seconds if it critically strikes.
Passive:
Your healing is increased by 15% on players with 30% or less health.

talents.name: Synchronized Fluttering
talents.description:
Hold down Fluttercall: Heal for 2 seconds to cast the ability on up to 4 allies within 4000 range in one cast. The mana cost is increased by 200% when cast in this way.
Passive:
Your Fluttercall: Heal ticks 100% faster for the first 6 seconds each time it begins healing a player.

talents.name: Symbiosis
talents.description:
Your Fluttercall: Restore Life's healing is increased by 8% for each Prickly Vine you have active.
Passive:
The duration of your Fluttercall: Restore Life is increased by 3 seconds.

talents.name: Sprouting Nettles
talents.description:
Each tick of Flutterfly Healing has a chance to make your next Nettlebolt Instant Cast and have 100% Critical Strike chance.
Passive:
Your Nettlebolt deals 20% increased damage.

talents.name: Elusive Wildling
talents.description:
You take 20% reduced damage while Hidden Trail is active.
Passive:
You take 10% less Area of effect damage

talents.name: Bluey's Gambit
talents.description:
While your Blue Flutterfly is following you, your movement speed is increased by 10%.
While your Blue Flutterfly is following another player, they take 3% reduced damage.
Passive: Your Movement Speed is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Bursting Petals
talents.description:
Your Life Petal's healing is front loaded, healing for twice as much on the the first tick and ramping down with each tick thereafter.
Passive: The healing of your Life Petal, Heartbloom, and Rootsap Revival is increased by 20%.

talents.name: Flower Power
talents.description:
Heart Bloom has 2 charges.
Passive:
Your Heart Bloom's mana cost is reduced by 30%.

talents.name: Bloomin' Boomshrooms
talents.description:
Upon detonation, each Shroomsplosion heals nearby allies for 150% Intellect.
Passive:
Your Shroomsplosion deals 20% increased damage

title: Child of the Forest
lore:
Abandoned at a young age, Sylvie was taken in and raised by the forest itself. She spent her childhood under the protection of its boughs and learning the natural cycles of magic from her friends, the Flutterflies.

As she grew, so did her curiosity about what was beyond the edges of the Forest. Deciding she has come of age and wishing to know more about where she came from, she has set off with her friends to explore Endring.

abilities.name: Wrath of Winter
abilities.description:
Invoke the spirits of the frozen tundra, causing you to passively cast a volley of Anima Spikes at enemies and generate 1 Winter Orb every 2 seconds. Lasts 20 seconds.
You deal 15% increased damage while Wrath of Winter is active.
SPIRIT ABILITY
When you activate your Spirit ability you gain Spirit of Heroism, granting +30% Haste for 20 sec.

abilities.name: Ice Dash
abilities.description: Quickly travel forward a short distance.

abilities.name: Brain Freeze
abilities.description:
Interrupt the target's spellcasting and prevent it from casting for 4 sec.
Must interrupt a spell, or it will have no effect.

abilities.name: Ice Comet
abilities.description: Unleash a large Ice Comet from above at target enemy, dealing 322% Intellect damage to all enemies caught in the impact radius.

abilities.name: Cold Snap
abilities.description:
Assault the target with extreme cold, dealing 189% Intellect damage.
Generates 1 Winter Orb

abilities.name: Glacial Blast
abilities.description: Hurl a a mass of ice at target enemy, dealing 542% Intellect damage.

abilities.name: Frost Bolt
abilities.description:
Hurl a bolt of water and frost at target enemy, dealing 73% Intellect damage.
Generates 3 Anima

abilities.name: Freezing Torrent
abilities.description:
Flay your target with a beam of frost energy, dealing 324% Intellect damage over 2 seconds while channeling.
Generates 1 Anima per tick up to 6 Anima when fully channeled.

abilities.name: Bursting Ice
abilities.description:
Conjures an icy crystal inside a target that periodically erupts, dealing 330% Intellect damage to the target and nearby enemies over 3 seconds.
Bursting Ice generates 1 Anima per enemy hit up to a maximum of 3 Anima each tick.

abilities.name: Frost Ward
abilities.description: You take 40% reduced damage for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Ice Blitz
abilities.description:
You enter a state of focused casting for 20 seconds, causing each Anima you generate to instantly shoot out an Anima Spike at your target.
You deal 15% increased damage while Ice Blitz is active.

abilities.name: Frigid Winds
abilities.description: Blast enemies in front of you with arctic winds, Knocking Back enemies and Slowing them by 50% for 12 sec.

abilities.name: Dance of Swallows
abilities.description:
Summon a flock of swallows that circle above target enemy for 20 seconds. Your Cold Snap and Freezing Torrent will command the Ice Swallows to swoop down on enemies dealing 57% Intellect per hit.
Ice Swallows benefit from and trigger all effects that Anima Spikes do.

abilities.name: Winter's Blessing
abilities.description: Your Spirit is increased by 20% for 12 seconds and all damage you deal is replicated as healing divided equally between all allies.

name: Rime
description:
Rime is a ranged caster that draws from the Anima within her soul and the elements around her to damage her opponents. She utilizes these powers in two forms: Anima and Winter Orbs.

Many of Rime's basic abilities channel a form of Anima which fills up her Anima Bar. When this bar is filled the Anima coalesces into Winter Orbs. As a result of this coalescing, the remaining Anima is sent as Anima Spikes at nearby engaged enemies.

Winter Orbs are represented by the orbs on Rime's interface above the Anima Bar; these Orbs are spent to empower Rime's more powerful elemental abilities.

talents.name: Chillblain
talents.description:
Your Freezing Torrent deals 20% of its damage each tick to up to 5 additional enemies near the target.
Passive: Your Freezing Torrent deals 20% increased damage.

talents.name: Coalescing Ice
talents.description:
When Bursting Ice deals damage to a single target it generates 2 additional Anima.
Passive: Your Bursting Ice damage is increased by 20%.

talents.name: Glacial Assault
talents.description:
Your Coldsnap ability causes you to gain 1 stack of Glacial Assault up to a maximum of 5 stacks.
Glacial Assault causes your next Glacial Blast to be instant cast and deal 10% inceased damage per stack of Glacial Assault consumed.
Passive: Your Glacial Blast has 10% increased Critical Strike chance.

talents.name: Unrelenting Ice
talents.description:
Each tick of Freezing Torrent reduces the cooldown of Bursting Ice by 0.5 seconds.
Passive: You take 10% less Area of Effect damage.

talents.name: Icy Flow
talents.description:
Each of your Anime Spike hits reduce the cooldown of Freezing Torrent by 0.2 seconds.
Passive: Your Movement Speed is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Avalanche
talents.description:
Ice Comet has a 50% chance to strike twice, and a 8% chance to strike three times.
Passive: Your Critical Strike Power is increased by 5%.

title: n/a
lore:
Hailing from the far and frozen north of Endring, Rime's upbringing instilled a healthy respect for the elemental forces around her. Her people spend their lives among the snow and ice and seek warmth and comfort in their traditions and the blessings of their tribal spirits.

Blessed or maybe cursed by the spirits of the land, Rime was given the the ability to manipulate the flows of Anima around her. A skill that her tribe thought lost to their past. She uses this ability to manipulate the water and ice around her, teaching her enemies to respect the elemental forces.

abilities.name: Avatar of Light
abilities.description:
Instantly heal all allies within a large radius of you for 280% Intellect and enter an enlightened state for 9 sec, enhancing your abilities.
Radiant Blast
Deals 50% increased damage and has no Cooldown.
Heal
Costs 50% less Mana and is Instant Cast.
Circle of Light
Costs 50% less Mana and has no Cooldown.

SPIRIT ABILITY
When you activate your Spirit ability you gain Spirit of Heroism, granting +30% Haste and 400% Mana Regeneration for 20 sec.

abilities.name: Dawnflare
abilities.description:
Deals 90% Intellect damage to target enemy and generates Rune Power.
Vigour can call upon the light to unleash a flare of divine light from above. This flash of radiant energy strikes the enemy with a sharp but controlled force.

abilities.name: Radiant Blast
abilities.description:
Within a cone in front of you, allies are healed for 87% Intellect and enemies take 113% Intellect damage.
Vigour expells an explosive flash of divine light from his outstretched hand, healing allies in its path, while searing enemies with its blinding brilliance.

abilities.name: Heal
abilities.description:
Heal target ally for 691% Intellect.
Vigour opens his sacred tome, drawing forth radiant power inscribed within its pages. With a solemn gesture, he calls forth a burst of healing energy to mend even the deepest wounds.

abilities.name: Circle of Light
abilities.description:
Place a Circle of Light on the ground, instantly healing all allies within its radius for 487% Intellect.
Vigour calls upon the power of light to create a circle of divine healing on the ground. Allies within its boundaries are restored in a sudden flash, as the light pours into them, mending their wounds.

abilities.name: Remove Magic
abilities.description: Remove all Harmful Magic Effects from target ally.

abilities.name: Soulbrand
abilities.description:
Deal 594% Intellect damage over 24 sec to target enemy.
Rune of Woe generates 1 Radiant Rune over its duration.
Vigour inscribes a searing rune onto the soul of his enemy, infusing it with radiant energy. The rune pulses painfully, steadily draining their life force while fueling Vigour’s power.

abilities.name: Rune of Renewal
abilities.description:
Instantly heal target ally for 594% Intellect and apply Rune of Renewal on them for 24 seconds, causing all your direct healing effects on that ally to echo for an additonal 25% of the initial heal's value.
Vigour inscribes a resonating rune onto the spirit of an ally. When Vigor heals that ally, the rune pulses gently, further mending any wounds that linger as its light nourishes the body and spirit.

abilities.name: Luminous Barrier
abilities.description:
Apply a shield to target ally that absorbs up to 1175% Intellect damage while it persists. The shield lasts for 8 sec.
Vigour inscribes a rune of protection onto an ally, causing light to be woven around them into a barrier of divine energy. The barrier stops all forms of attack, whether forged by steel or conjured by magic.

abilities.name: Dawnbreaker Orb
abilities.description:
Conjure an orb of light that slowly travels forward, healing all allies it touches for 310% Intellect and damaging enemies for 265% Intellect.
Each ally and enemy touched by Dawnbreaker Orb generates a small amount of Rune Power.
Vigour conjures an orb of intricate runes, humming with radiant power. The orb shines brilliantly as it slowly drifts forward, burning all darkness from its path and bolstering the lifeforce of Vigour's allies.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description:
Your movement speed is increased by 50% for 6 seconds.
Levitation
You take 20% reduced Area of Effect damage while levitating.

abilities.name: Runic Proliferation
abilities.description: Instantly generate 3 Radiant Runes. For the next 8 seconds, any Rune Abilities you cast are empowered, increasing their effectiveness by 20%.

abilities.name: Lightshaper's Ward
abilities.description: Target ally takes 20% reduced damage for 12 seconds.

name: Vigour

talents.name: Epiphany
talents.description:
Your Dawnflare, Soulbrand & Radiant Blast have a 15% chance to make your next Heal instant cast and cost 50% less Mana.
Epiphany stacks up to 3 times.
Passive:
Your Condemn deals 10% increased damage.

talents.name: Enduring Light
talents.description:
The healing of your Circle of Light is increased by up to 50% depending on the amount of health the target is missing. Lower health gives a larger bonus.
Passive:
Your Circle of Light's mana cost is reduced by 25%.

talents.name: Ruptured Soul
talents.description:
When an enemy dies while Soulbrand is active on them you instantly gain 50% of the Rune Power it would have generated in the time that was remaining and trigger an explosion dealing 50% of the damage that was remaining to all nearby enemies.
Passive:
Your Soulbrand deals 15% increased damage.

talents.name: Beacon in the Dark
talents.description:
Each time Soulbrand deals damage you have a chance to reset the cooldown of Radiant Blast and make your next Radiant Blast have 100% critical strike chance.
Passive:
Your Radiant Blast healing is increased by 20%.

talents.name: Sacred Barrier
talents.description:
Allies under the effects of Luminous Barrier take 5% reduced damage.
Passive:
You take 10% reduced damage from Area of Effect attacks.

talents.name: Expansive Mind
talents.description:
Your Dawnflare casts have a chance to grant you Expansive Mind, increasing your expertise by 10% for 16 seconds and replenishing 8% of your mana over the duration..
Passive:
Your maximum mana is increased by 5%.

talents.name: Master of Triage
talents.description:
Each time you fill a Rune resource, a free Greater Heal of 50% efficiency is cast on a nearby ally, prefering the player with lowest health.
Passive:
Greater Heal has 0.5s reduced cast time

talents.name: Meticulous Runesmith
talents.description:
Runesphere cost reduced by 1 Rune.
Passive:
Your Runesphere healing and damage is increased by 30%

talents.name: Grand Design
talents.description:
Your Single Target Rune abilities can now be held down to charge them up. For every 1 second you charge them, they will spend another Rune and apply to another target up to 4.
Passive:
Your Rune of Woe, Rune of Mending & Rune of Protection have 20% increased duration.

title: Rune Priest
lore:
Born into a lineage of devoted priests who worshipped the primordial forces of light, Vigour exhibited a unique connection to the light from an early age—one far beyond that of his peers. However, Vigour had little interest in the life his elders envisioned for him: a life spent locked away in secluded monasteries, surrounded by books and murals, experiencing the world solely through the eyes of others. Instead, he chose a path of exploration, traveling across the lands, seeing the world with his own eyes, and creating his own stories. During his travels, he immersed himself in the study of ancient rune carvings that spoke of the fabled Light-Bringers—beings said to have woven the very fabric of creation with their radiant power.

On one of his journeys, Vigour stumbled upon an dusty tome that set him on the path toward his destiny. Within its pages lay the secrets of the Radiant Runes—describing an ancient discipline for binding light itself in order to wield it as an extension of one's will.

Through his eventual mastery of the Radiant Runes, Vigour now taps into the very essence of light with ease—a power he uses to defend those in need from the many forms of darkness that seek to corrupt the world. His sacred duty is not only to heal the wounded but also to strike down those who would use shadows to harm the innocent. It is said that the light he calls forth is both a gift of life and a harbinger of divine wrath, as those who stand in his way are met with the full force of his radiant judgment.

abilities.name: Raging Tempest
abilities.description:
You gain an enhanced version of Thunder Call for 20 seconds.
Raging Curents
In addition to it's normal effects, Raging Currents strike a random nearby enemy every 0.5 seconds dealing 66% Strength lightning damage. Each time Raging Currents hits an enemy your Critical Strike chance is increased by 1.5%, stacking up to 20 times.
SPIRIT ABILITY
When you activate your Spirit ability you gain Spirit of Heroism, granting +30% Haste for 20 sec.

abilities.name: Heavy Strike
abilities.description:
Your next Auto Attack deals 240% increased damage.
Thunder Call
Heavy Strike also charges the ground in front of you with lightning, dealing 150% Strength damage to enemies near the target.
Generates Fury relative to damage dealt

abilities.name: Wild Swing
abilities.description:
Swing your hammer in a wide arc toward target enemy dealing 62% Strength damage them and any nearby enemies.
Recklessness
- Enemies have an increased chance to Dodge Wild Swing.
- Wild Swing cannot Critically Strike.
- Damage of Wild Swing is increased by an amount equal to your Critical Strike chance percentage.
Generates Fury relative to damage dealt

abilities.name: Face Breaker
abilities.description:
Instantly attack target enemy dealing 275% Strength damage.
Face Breaker can only be used after one of your attacks Misses or is Dodged by an enemy.
Generates Fury relative to damage dealt

abilities.name: Skull Crusher
abilities.description:
Instantly deal 340% Strength damage to target enemy.
Thunder Call
Skull Crusher beckons a thunder bolt to strike the target from above, dealing 272% Strength damage.

abilities.name: Leap Smash
abilities.description:
Instantly Leap to target area and smash the ground, dealing 253% Strength damage to all nearby enemies.
Generates 25 Fury

abilities.name: Pummel
abilities.description: Instantly interrupt target enemy's spell cast, and silence them for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Thunder Call
abilities.description:
Call on Thunder to charge your hammer with immense power, enhancing your abilities for 20 seconds.
Generates 25 Fury

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description:
Conjure an arc of lightning onto target enemy that chains between you and other enemies until it has dealt damage 5 times. Each hit of Chain Lightning deals 95% Strength damage.
Chain Lightning does not deal damage to you.
Thunder Call
Chain Lightning requires you to have Thunder Call active.
Generates Fury relative to damage dealt

abilities.name: Hammer Storm
abilities.description:
Spin with your Hammer, dealing 56% Strength damage every 0.7 seconds to all nearby enemies.
Hammer Storm has an initial cost of 26 Fury, and an additional 8 Fury every 0.7 seconds until you have spent a maximum of 50 Fury per use.
Thunder Call
Hammer Storm causes lightning to strike you as you spin, shocking enemies hit for an additional 45% Strength damage every 0.7 seconds.

abilities.name: Unbreakable Will
abilities.description:
You take 30% reduced damage for 6 seconds and then 20% reduced damage for an additional 4 seconds.
While active, your Unbreakable Will ability is replaced by Taunt.
Taunt
Forces target enemy to attack you for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Focused Wrath
abilities.description: Your next two casts of Skull Crusher or Hammer Storm cost 50% less Fury and deal 30% increased damage.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description:
Instantly intimidate up to 8 enemies in a 800 radius, causing them to cower in place for 10 seconds.
Damage dealt to Intimidated enemies may break the effect.

abilities.name: Culling Strike
abilities.description:
Instantly deal 150% Strength damage to target enemy. Culling Strike spends up to 20 Fury, increasing its damage by 15% for each Fury spent up to 300%.
Execution
Can only be used against enemies that have 30% or less health.

name: Tariq
description:
Tariq is a melee damage dealer, who utilizes slow continual auto-attacks, timed between reactions and ability swings. These attacks can be charged with abilities such as Heavy Strike to deal more damage and generate Fury.

Tariq utilizes a mechanic called ‘Fury.’ Fury is a resource by Tariq's empowered auto attacks which allows him to call upon heavy damage dealing abilities such as Chain Lightning and Thunder Call.

Overall Tariq is a steady DPS whose timing based abilities allow him to burst damage periodically throughout the fight.

talents.name: Square Hammer
talents.description:
Wild Swing, Face Breaker, Leap Smash & Chain Lightning increase the damage of your next Heavy Strike by 8%, stacking up to 5 times.
Passive: Your Critical Strike Power is increased by 5%.

talents.name: Left Hand Path
talents.description:
Face Breaker has 50% additional Critical Strike chance.
Passive: Your Face Breaker deals 10% increased damage.

talents.name: Blood & Thunder
talents.description:
When you deal damage with Heavy Strike, you have a chance (PPM) to cast a free Chain Lightning at the target.
Passive:
Chain Lightning damage increased by 20%%.

talents.name: Far Beyond Driven
talents.description:
You take 10% reduced damage while performing Hammer Storm.
Passive: You take 10% less damage from Area of Effect attacks.

talents.name: Mouth for War
talents.description:
WIP! PASSIVE WORKS BUT NOT THE MAIN!
When you taunt an enemy, that enemy deals 30% reduced damage to you for 6 seconds.
Passive:
You take 5% less Magic Damage.

talents.name: Bloodline
talents.description:
While you do not have Thunder Call active, you deal 20% increased damage.
Passive:
Your Movement Speed is increased by 10%

talents.name: Ride the Lightning
talents.description:
Thunder Call generates 80 additional Fury over 20 seconds.
Passive: Your Lightning Damage has 10% increased Critical Strike chance.

talents.name: Pneuma
talents.description:
Heavy Strike increases your Haste by 2% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
Passive: Your attack speed is increased by 40%.

title: Guardian of Amari
lore:
Tariq is a giant of a man, strong of hand and stronger of heart. He lived a simple life of calm and peace, but one fateful day, his partner and child were lost in the wars of the Clans.

He took their bodies and climbed the sacred mountain to enact their burial rights. Over their pyres to the sky, Tariq's stoic demeanor crumbled and his temper let loose as he raged in fury. He beseeched the sky for the strength to give his fury meaning and protect those below.

When he descended from the mountain everyone in the Clan could tell he was a changed man. The atmosphere around him was electric, and there was lightning in his eyes. A new strength powered his swings and when he embraced the rising fury, those around him could see the physical manifestation of the tempest of his soul.

abilities.name: Twin Souls: Army of One
abilities.description:
You split your soul into the Sibling of Wind and the Sibling of Earth for X seconds.
SIBLING OF EARTH (controlled)
While Twin Souls: Army of One is active, the Sibling of Earth takes 40% reduced damage.
SIBLING OF WIND
The Sibling of Wind swiftly teleports to, and strikes, nearby enemies up to 32 times dealing 92% agility damage with each strike.
SPIRIT ABILITY
When you activate your Spirit ability you gain Spirit of Heroism, granting +30% Haste for 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Spirit Palm
abilities.description:
Deals 20% Agility damage to target enemy.
Grants access to Palm Technique finishers.
Combo Builder

abilities.name: Wind Kick
abilities.description:
Deals 20% Agility damage to your target and other enemies near your target.
Grants access to Kick Technique finishers.
Combo Builder

abilities.name: Earth Fist
abilities.description:
Deals 20% Agility damage to target enemy.
Grants access to Fist Technique finishers.
Combo Builder

abilities.name: Fighting Techniques
abilities.description:
Grants access to Finishing Moves based on Combo Builders used:
PALM TECHNIQUES
Spirited Strikes
• Grants +20% Haste & +5% Parry for 15 sec.
Spirited Vortex
• Conjures a Vortex around you that provides +5% Dodge and deals damage to nearby enemies over 18 sec.
KICK TECHNIQUES
Rising Storm
• Deals damage to the target and grants 2 Stormfall charges, increasing the damage of your next 2 Lashing Stormkicks by 100%.
Lashing Stormkick
• Deals damage to target and nearby enemies nearby. Heals you for 50% of the damage it deals.
FIST TECHNIQUES
Rising Earth
• Deals damage to the target and grants 2 Earthfall charges, increasing the damage of your next 2 Earthfist Barrages by 100%.
Earthfist Barrage
• Pummels target enemy over 2 seconds and heals you for 50% of the damage it deals.

abilities.name: Taunt
abilities.description: Taunt the target, forcing it to attack you for 6 sec.

abilities.name: Gust
abilities.description: Quickly travel forward a short distance.

abilities.name: Stagger
abilities.description:
Interrupt the target's spellcasting and prevent it from casting for 4 sec.
Must interrupt a spell, or it will have no effect.

abilities.name: Stone Shield
abilities.description:
Summon 3 protective stones around you that spin in a wide circle, dealing 160% Agility damage to all nearby enemies.
Each stone increases armor by 25%, up to a maximum of 75%.
While at least one is active, the stones mitigate 30% of all damage you take. When the stones have mitigated 800% Agility, one of the stones will break.

abilities.name: Shatter Earth
abilities.description: Leap and slam the ground at a target location, dealing 207% Agility damage to all enemies in the area and leaving an area of quaking earth that deals 184% Agility damage over 6 seconds to any enemy standing in in the effect.

abilities.name: Serenity
abilities.description:
Instantly heal yourself for 140% Agility.
Your Auto Attacks and Tage Kachi: Sanbo hits increase the healing of Serenity by 30%, stacking up to 50 times.

abilities.name: Cyclone
abilities.description: Create a Cyclone of strong winds that instantly pulls in all enemies within the radius to you.

abilities.name: Twin Souls: Bulwark
abilities.description:
Split your soul into the Sibling of Wind and the Sibling of Earth for up to 20 seconds.
SIBLING OF WIND (controlled)
The Sibling of Wind takes 20% of any damage dealt to the Sibling of Earth..
SIBLING OF EARTH
The Sibling of Earth taunts all enemies in a 1000 radius around them every 1.5 seconds. If the Sibling of Earth is destroyed before the duration ends, Twin Souls: Bulwark ends.

abilities.name: Stone Stomp
abilities.description: Send a shockwave through the ground in front of you, dealing 119% Agility damage to enemies in its wake and Stunning them for 3 sec.

name: Meiko
description: Meiko is a hybrid melee fighter who utilizes a toolkit of Combo Builders to enable a variety of Fighting Techniques. These Fighting Techniques buff Meiko’s stats and attacks, while giving access to Finishing Moves.

talents.name: Earthwell
talents.description:
Each hit with Earthfist Barrage adds 1 Serenity charge.
Passive:
Earth abilities deal 10% increased damage

talents.name: Stone Shield Healing Buff
talents.description:
When you cast Stone Shield your healing taken is increased by 20% increased 6 seconds.
Passive:
Stone Shield deals 20% more damage.

talents.name: Thunder Kick
talents.description:
Lashing Stormkick has a 50% chance to deal damage an additional time for 30% the initial hit.
Passive:
Lashing Stormkick has 10% increased Critical Strike chance.

talents.name: Equilibrium
talents.description:
Each time you cast "Gust" you release a explosion of wind at your starting location, causing all enemies within 750 radius to have 50% reduced movement speed for 6 seconds.
Passive:
Your movement speed is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Spirited Advance
talents.description:
Shatter Earth applies "Spirited Strikes" and "Spirited Vortex" buffs to you.
Passive:
You take 5% less Magic Damage from enemies.

talents.name: Harsh Winds
talents.description:
Enemies hit by Spirited Vortex have 20% reduced Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
Passive:
Spirited Vortex damage increased by 10%

title: The Fighter
lore:
Meiko was sent to vanquish an unspeakable evil to make her people safe. She was strong, she was ready, but it all went wrong. She battled for what seemed like an eternity, but before she delivered the final blow the evil vanished in a blaze of smoke, it was an illusion, a trick!

As the wind blew away the disguise, the smell of ash and a distant fire reached Meiko and her heart sank. While she was fighting the illusion, the evil had laid waste to her city and its people.

The evil had destroyed her home and her purpose, now only she remains. Meiko cannot undo what has happened to her people, but she can avenge them. That will be her purpose now.
